summary: Michael C. Eberhardt was an employee of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). He appears in multiple payroll and certification reports spanning from October 1977 to November 1978. These documents list his name, position, and salary during that period. The documents suggest that Eberhardt was a staff member of the HSCA during its investigation into the JFK assassination.
